fields: I’m well aware that you have met my distributor.
Understand that once you are in on the business, there are severe consequences for snitching.
As long as you keep a good reputation in this business, we can remain as allies. I take care of my own.
Now in order to test your abilities, I need you to obtain some new beakers from the storage room.
Here, take one of these vials.
They contain a staining solution and when you throw them on the ground, they will create a mess for the Janitor.
Don’t be seen, and make it quick.
